2021 Adobe Corporate Social Responsibility Report Community
Creativity for All, Diversity & Inclusion, and Tech for Good all emerged as key themes in Adobe's 2020 materiality assessment. The following disclosures  
demonstrate our progress in these critical areas for communities around the world. The following metrics demonstrate some of the ways Adobe is contributing to  
the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals of: 4. Quality Education; 5. Gender Equality; 8. Decent Work and Economic Growth; 10. Reduced Inequalities.
